Difficulty Notes: Testing the edge-cases of the mermaid card. This tests a case where there may be adversarial paths.
Question: Assume all other players have already passed. Given this game state, what is the maximum guaranteed net number of VP the player can gain in two actions? Output the answer as: Previous amount: <num>, New amount: <num>
Rationale: Action 1: use sacrificial pit second power to destroy mermaid card, netting four gold. Action 2: Use four gold to purchase temple card.
